title: Sustainability Pledge Form
description: Commit to sustainable practices and help protect our planet

intro_text.title: Join Our Sustainability Movement
intro_text.description: Thank you for your interest in making a sustainability pledge. By committing to sustainable practices in your daily life, you are helping to create a healthier planet for current and future generations. This pledge is a personal commitment to reduce your environmental footprint and promote sustainable living in your community.

pledge_benefits.title: Benefits of Your Pledge
pledge_benefits.description:
By making this sustainability pledge, you will:

• Reduce your personal environmental impact
• Join a community of like-minded individuals committed to sustainability
• Receive resources and tips to help you achieve your sustainability goals
• Track your progress and see the collective impact of our community
• Be invited to sustainability events and workshops
• Help create a more sustainable future for all

pledge_process.title: Pledge Process
pledge_process.description: This form will guide you through assessing your current practices and selecting specific sustainability commitments. You'll receive a personalized sustainability plan based on your pledges, along with resources to help you succeed. We'll check in periodically to support your journey and celebrate your achievements.
